remarks: This lemma proves that for n sufficiently large, q_n( t ) < ε, for all ` t ` in ` T \ U ` : see Lemma 1 [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 91 (at the top of page 91). ` Q ` is used to represent q_n in the paper, ` N ` to represent n in the paper, ` K ` to represent k, ` D ` to represent δ, ` P ` to represent p, and ` E ` to represent ε. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:

stoweidlem25.8 $e |- ( ph -> A. t e. ( T \ U ) D <_ ( P ` t ) ) $.
stoweidlem25.9 $e |- ( ph -> E e. RR+ ) $.
stoweidlem25.11 $e |- ( ph -> ( 1 / ( ( K x. D ) ^ N ) ) < E ) $.
